entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
